EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 6: Timing isn't right
EmailTemplate.subject: Is our timing off?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I've reached out a few times to see if it makes sense to connect regarding our HGuide IMUs and inertial navigation systems.
Since I haven't heard back, I'll assume the timing isn't right.
In the meantime, here are some resources that serve as resources to help you find the right IMU or inertial navigation system that meets your needs:
Resource 1: The Top Five Things to Consider Before Buying an Inertial Navigation System [Infographic] <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell IMU Hguide-n580_Five Things to Consider_Infographic.pdf]]> Resource 2: How to Enhance Point Clouds Using Honeywell's HGuide n580 [E-guide] <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_IMU_ROS-Hguide-n580-Whitepaper.pdf]]> Resource 3: Synchronize an HGuide n580 with a Velodyne HDL-32E or VLP-16 LiDAR unitÂ [E-guide] <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_IMU_Velodyne-Whitepaper.pdf]]>
Best,{{lead.hGuide Sales Owner Full Name:default=Hguide Support}}
